message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor to start. It benefits us both to settle now.
Let's flip that split, Alice.  55/45 in my favor this time.  We can still end this round and avoid inflation.
This is getting us nowhere, Bob.  A 50/50 split is the only fair solution. Let's take it before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
